content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 13}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 46, "index": 44}]
thought: To craft jungle_slab, I need to first craft jungle_planks. To do this, I need to move the jungle_wood from slot 13 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 13 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_wood", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 46, "index": 44}]
thought: Now that the jungle_planks have been crafted, I need to move them to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
Ok
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4

TASK: Craft an item of type: jungle_slab
inventory=[{"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 46, "index": 44}]
thought: Now I need to craft the jungle_slab. To do this, I need to move the jungle_planks from slot 11 to the crafting grid (slot 1).
Ok
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "jungle_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 0}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 3}, {"type": "jungle_planks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "iron_sword", "quantity": 1, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 3, "index": 34}, {"type": "smooth_sandstone_slab", "quantity": 26, "index": 37}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 46, "index": 44}]
